    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Application
    Represents a student's application for an internship.
    ApplicationController
    A controller that manages the operation of student's internship applications.
    AppliedRecord
    Represents a record of a student's application to an internship.
    ApprovedFilter
    Keeps only internships with status "Approved".
    BeforeDateFilter
     
    CareerCenterStaff
    Represents a Career Center Staff user.
    ClosingDateFilter
     
    CompanyRepController
    Controller for managing Company Representative operations.
    CompanyRepresentative
    Represents a Company Representative user.
    CompanyRepUI
    Provides a console-based user interface for Company Representatives.
    CSSController
    Controller for managing Career Center Staff (CSS) operations.
    CSStaffUI
    Provides a console-based user interface for Career Center Staff (CSS) users.
    FileService
     
    FilterManager
    Manages user-specific filter settings in memory.
    FilterPipeline
    Represents a pipeline of multiple InternshipFilter instances.
    IEligibilityFilter
     
    IInternshipSorter
     
    Internship
    Represents an Internship opportunity posted by a company.
    InternshipController
    Controller for managing Internship operations.
    InternshipFilter
    Represents a filter for a list of Internship objects.
    LevelFilter
     
    LevelType
     
    LoginUI
    Provides a console-based login and registration interface for the Internship Placement Management System.
    MajorFilter
     
    NotFilledFilter
    Keeps only internships that are NOT filled.
    StatusFilter
     
    Student
    Represents a student user in the internship system.
    StudentController
    manage actions Student can perform - View available internships - Apply for internships - View their applications - Accept offers - Request withdrawals - Filter internships Coordinate between: - Student model - InternshipController (for available internships) - ApplicationController (for applying, withdrawing) - FileService (for saving changes)
    StudentEligibilityFilter
    Concrete implementation of IEligibilityFilter containing the complex student eligibility rules (major, level, visibility).
    StudentUI
    Provides a console-based interface for Student users in the Internship Placement Management System.
    SystemController
    Central system controller.
    TitleSorter
     
    User
    Abstract base class representing a generic system user.
    UserController
     
    UserFilterSettings
     
    VisibilityFilter
     
    WithdrawRequest
    Represents a withdrawal request submitted by a student for a specific internship.
